name: Zero Guard Demo
description:
In the year 201 New Era, war breaks out as an unknown military faction ravage the the Asian Continent. Intel have discovered an illegal arms dealer named Red Star is fueling the faction's violent crusades. Learning this, the government of Japan has enlisted the services of Kogeki Defense and Security, also known as KDS, to eliminate Red Star. Now, an android named Ava, aka THE SIXTEENTH, ventures out in her custom built New Type Buster Tank "Unlimited Blue" on a quest to fulfill guerrilla missions to destroy Red Star and put an end to the massive war!

Header art by https://twitter.com/khyleri
